page.title: 12WYCLIFFE BIBLE TRANSLATORS.
page.content: The Wycliffe Centre in Horsleys Green is the British HQ of the Wycliffe Bible Translators, an{International {Christian Organisation}for translating the Bible into those languages which do not yet have it.There are over 5000 spoken languages,only a quarter have a translation of the Bible or N.T. The H.Q. has several functions: recruiting & sending out of new workers;(which entails contact with all denominations in this country.)Under the name of the {Summer Institute of Linguistics}SIL it provides very specialised training for previosly unwritten languages to be written down, together with the study of how languages are structured. Training in{anthropology & literacy}is also given.An important part of the field work of SIL is teaching reading & providing literacy materials in indigenous languages.
